meta_title: Getting Started with Next.js - Hassan's Blog
meta_description: A comprehensive guide to getting started with Next.js development
title: Getting Started with Next.js

content.text: Next.js is a powerful React framework that makes building full-stack web applications simple and efficient. In this guide, we'll explore the fundamentals of Next.js and how to get started with your first project.
From server-side rendering to API routes, Next.js provides everything you need to build modern web applications with excellent performance and developer experience.

meta_description: Essential TypeScript best practices for better code quality
title: TypeScript Best Practices

content.text: TypeScript has become an essential tool in modern web development. In this article, we'll cover the best practices that will help you write more maintainable and robust TypeScript code.
From proper type definitions to advanced patterns, these practices will improve your development workflow and reduce bugs in production.
